title: Jam 2021: Research
short_description: Are you a college or university student, curious about how research and the generation of new knowledge is fundamental to the work of the museum?
header_description: Learn how research and the generation of new knowledge is fundamental to the work of the museum.
list_description: Learn how research and the generation of new knowledge is fundamental to the work of the museum.
description:
Speakers:

Kathryn Kremnitzer, Research Associate, Sculpture and Painting of Europe
Clara Granzotto, Assistant Conservation Scientist
Kim Muir, Research Conservator, Paintings

This program is meant for college and university students who want to learn about careers in the museum field from working professionals. Learn more about JAM 2021.
buy_button_caption: This free event is for college and university students only; registration required
